verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Lord, lift me up
and let me stand,
By faith, on heaven’s
table land,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
A higher plane than
I have found;
Lord, plant my feet
on higher ground.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I’m pressing on
the upward way,
New heights
I’m gaining everyday;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Still praying as
I onward bound,
“Lord, plant my feet
on higher ground.”

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
My heart has no
desire to stay
Where doubts arise
and fears dismay;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Tho’ some may dwell
where these abound’
My prayer, my aim,
is higher ground.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I want to live
above the world,
Tho’ Satan’s darts
at me are hurled;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
For faith has caught
the joyful sound,
The song of saints
on higher ground.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I want to scale
the utmost height,
And catch a gleam
of glory bright;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
But still I’ll pray
till heaven I’ve found,
“Lord, lead me on
to higher ground.”
